name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, ezcmac, zcross00, mikeronomicon, pwb, tttt, goocifer, Moguin, GeyserShitdick, Moraiat, HSE, MajorDovi, Sweetlips, hellaurie, Sargasm, atticusonline, mrchee, LordPretzel, aHatOfPig, cognitonaut, anewcede, Fcannon, bixschmix, heatbag, stormagnet, whymog, sp1derbaby, ouroboros, afvbs, kestral, SotiCoto)

name: catachresis
text: A comment left by catachresis was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by alphagator, Sweetlips, Taidje_Khan, STUART)

name: caduceo
text: A comment left by caduceo was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by patkun, mysterymeat1001, straw, featurelessvoid, RedMad, jaredwilde, sneechles, NDCaesar, Kennisiou, aesop_punk, yaegmenthor, nathanielperson, holly_golightly, peterjoel, Satyr, LiquidCruelty)

name: brokeaccount
text: Looks like one of the characters from web comics that tried to crash Ray's toilet party. Only for real.

name: n00b
text: I don't think I've ever seen him OFF punishment

name: peterjoel
text: oh, he needs to be punished alright. But you know, occasionally he makes a post that is not offensive or a waste of time, and that does not deserve to be lamed just because of the rest.

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by mysterymeat1001, zcross00, TonyHighwind, atticusonline, achilleselbow, BjorntD, Doc_Rostov, yaegmenthor)

name: farqussus
text:
I think the problem is that he unerringly first. The implication being that he sits and refreshes. Constantly. All writing rough drafts of his scathing, glib cuff-flickings in a notepad file on another monitor. Less and less concerned over their relevance to the subject at hand.

I know he's gone now, but I've been trawling through the archive and he shits me to tears still.

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, zcross00, Mangtastic, achilleselbow, Doc_Rostov, tellumo)

name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by thedice, mikeronomicon, atticusonline, eRiUukFJk, joamiq)

name: goff
text: I think the problem is that your "off-the-cuff" comments read like the worst kind of fan. You love it so much but believe you could do it better. You write small sad comments in the hope that, one day, someone will say "HE should have invented Achewood!" Do something with your own life instead of making these horrible posts. You are not good at life because you make up nicknames for achewood characters.

name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by thedice, johnnybaverage, mikeronomicon, headphones, unalone, FancyRat, eRiUukFJk)

name: fancyrat
text:
I believe I whiteknighted you at some point in the archives. I regret this. Get over yourself.

Also, speculation: Your defense of the amount of time it takes you to write a post means that farqussus is 100% correct.

name: asherdan
text:
What a load of... speculation .

Show up 5 months late and be a dick to strangers?

Sweet, go for it!

name: asherdan
text: [14 seconds for that gem. You're welcome.]

name: saint
text:
Speculation: the idiot's newspaper.

It's so much easier to assume than to get the facts straight.
Can you blame the poor fucksticks? No, buy you CAN endorse their immediate extermination.

name: farqussus
text: Even Asherdan knows you as a dick Saint. Go away.

name: saint
text:
He does?

Someone should tell him he doesn't like me.
That way he'll know, too. Thanks for pointing it out, bud.

By the by, who the hell are you?

name: farqussus
text: I'm just someone who went through the archives once or twice and was annoyed by basically everything you clicked post to. that's all. where have you been for the last year, by the way? why did you come back?

name: saint
text:
I came back to re-read through and catch back up. A hectic schedule kept me from being able to stay on top of the comic.

I'm sorry I annoy you. Enjoy your life.

name: soticoto
text: You ain't the only one.

name: soticoto
text: And somehow I need to find a way to lame people again. Preferably a thousandfold. Preferably Doc Rostov. He just seems to need it.

name: snowman
text: POT TO KETTLE

name: bixschmix
text: Unky Pepper? 'Stad? Either of those in a post is enough to warrant a lame from me.

name: epicurus
text: A comment left by epicurus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Interestingname, mortshire, morbo)

name: snowman
text: I know . Is so good.

name: jezebel
text: I want to take lessons in how to speak "pissed off bottle of Wild Turkey."  I SO do.  With a vengeance.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Rampant robot ass mooning the stars.

name: riazm
text: I wish pissed off bottle of Wild Turkey Little Nephew had been given more screen time.

name: jordstar
text: I completely forgot this strip had more than one robot's ass in it!

name: dasilodavi
text: I wouldn't mind watching a facsimile of myself getting killed.  I imagine it would be a grand thrill!

name: spectre
text: More like a Grand Guignol

name: nonemorenegative
text: Poor Andy, I don't think he even has an ass to join in with the other three...

name: cailetshadow
text: See last comic, panel 5

name: hateandwar
text:
He's got kind of crack if you check the previous strip.

That said, the reason I rated this strip a five is the last panel with all of the robots mooning. I mean, I got nothing against the rest of the strip, it's just that the first panel is such a delight that I don't care about the rest. It earned my approval with one little image.

name: mattylite
text: YES!!!

name: echidnaboy
text:
She's a brick... house
That is absolutely the best song to play while mooning out of a moving pickup

name: blahhhhhhh
text: The first panel is eleventy billion kids of awesome

name: blahhhhhhh
text: KINDS! I mean.

name: stormagnet
text: Too late! Now we have a population problem. An awesome population problem.

name: zebra
text: 5'd mostly for the alt text

name: jthm_guitarist
text: 1 I love this alt text.

name: mattylite
text: Vlad can drive and moon at the same time.  Is so good.

name: snowman
text: LOL'd at the alt-text

name: alaric101
text: Great story arc. I love the southern fried cliche.

name: tonyhighwind
text: This could be just the first panel and it would still be fine.

name: greenkoolayd
text: wild turkey is totally blaze.

name: boheeka
text: I like to imagine that Uncle Culpepper is Ambrose Bierce.
